name: Tolterodine Tartrate

indications.text: tolterodine tartrate tablets indicated treatment overactive bladder symptoms urge urinary incontinence , urgency , frequency .

contraindications.text: initial recommended dose tolterodine tartrate tablets 2 mg twice daily . dose may lowered 1 mg twice daily based individual response tolerability . patients significantly reduced hepatic renal function currently taking drugs potent inhibitors cyp3a4 , recommended dose tolterodine tartrate tablets 1 mg twice daily ( , general , , reduced hepatic renal function , , ) .

warningsAndPrecautions: tolterodine tartrate tablets 1 mg ( white , round , biconvex , film-coated tablets engraved arcs letters “ ” ) tolterodine tartrate tablets 2 mg ( white , round , biconvex , film-coated tablets engraved arcs letters “ dt ” ) supplied follows : bottles 601 mg ndc 59762-0170-62 mg ndc 59762-0800-2 bottles 5001 mg ndc 59762-0170-12 mg ndc 59762-0800-6 store 25ºc ( 77ºf ) ; excursions permitted 15–30ºc ( 59–86ºf ) [ usp controlled room temperature ] . greenstone® branddistributed : greenstone llc morgantown , wv 26505 u.s.a. © 2024 viatris inc. brands listed trademarks respective owners . gst : tolt : r1 revised : 9/2024
adverseReactions: tolterodine tartrate tablets contraindicated patients urinary retention , gastric retention , uncontrolled narrow-angle glaucoma . tolterodine tartrate tablets also contraindicated patients demonstrated hypersensitivity ingredients , fesoterodine fumarate extended-release tablets , like tolterodine tartrate tablets , metabolized 5-hydroxymethyl tolterodine .
indications_original: Tolterodine tartrate tablets are indicated for the treatment of overactive bladder with symptoms of urge urinary incontinence, urgency, and frequency.
contraindications_original:
The initial recommended dose of tolterodine tartrate tablets is 2 mg twice daily. The dose may be lowered to 1 mg twice daily based on individual response and tolerability. For patients with significantly reduced hepatic or renal function or who are currently taking drugs that are potent inhibitors of CYP3A4, the recommended dose of tolterodine tartrate tablets is 1 mg twice daily (see 
                        PRECAUTIONS, General, PRECAUTIONS, Reduced Hepatic and Renal Function, and 
                        PRECAUTIONS, Drug Interactions
                     ).
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Tolterodine Tartrate Tablets 1 mg (white, round, biconvex, film-coated tablets engraved with arcs above and below the letters “TO”) and Tolterodine Tartrate Tablets 2 mg (white, round, biconvex, film-coated tablets engraved with arcs above and below the letters “DT”) are supplied as follows:
                  Bottles of 601 mg     NDC 59762-0170-62 mg     NDC 59762-0800-2
                  Bottles of 5001 mg     NDC 59762-0170-12 mg     NDC 59762-0800-6
                  Store at 25ºC (77ºF); excursions permitted to 15–30ºC (59–86ºF) [see USP Controlled Room Temperature].
                  GREENSTONE® BRANDDistributed by:
                     Greenstone LLC
                     Morgantown, WV 26505 U.S.A. 
                  © 2024 Viatris Inc.
                  The brands listed are trademarks of their respective owners.
                  GST:TOLT:R1
                  Revised: 9/2024
adverseReactions_original: Tolterodine tartrate tablets are contraindicated in patients with urinary retention, gastric retention, or uncontrolled narrow-angle glaucoma. Tolterodine tartrate tablets are also contraindicated in patients who have demonstrated hypersensitivity to the drug or its ingredients, or to fesoterodine fumarate extended-release tablets which, like tolterodine tartrate tablets, are metabolized to 5-hydroxymethyl tolterodine.
